entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
